title: Gove reinforces doors and windows amid MPs' election security fears
text:
Michael Gove has had the doors and windows of his house reinforced as he and other MPs voiced concerns about their personal security ahead of the general election.

The Cabinet member’s wife, the journalist Sarah Vine, revealed the couple had been told by police that their home was a “serious security hazard” and they had decided to have bars "akin to steel girders" installed against the threat of protestors attacking their property.

It came as the Liberal Democrat Heidi Allen, who is standing down at the election, revealed she had received an email accusing her of "killing a baby" as she said such "vile" abuse was making the job of an MP impossible.

On Wednesday another MP, who has received a...
description: Michael Gove has had the doors and windows of his house reinforced as he and other MPs voiced concerns about their personal security ahead of the general election.
